Server.Name: Death By Darkness
Server.Description:
A mod centered around deathmatch PvP play - though you can play SP and PvE! Also to celebrate 5000 subscribers!
Recommended Settings for PvP: - Day Length: 40 mins (Easy) or 30 mins (Challenging) - Day Night Cycle: 18 Hours - Air Drops: Daily - Loot Respawn: Every 3 Days - Difficulty: Warrior (Easy) or Survivalist (Challenging) - Drop on Death: Backpack Only
